DOC.brief_summary: Study Description The purpose study compare defibrillation efficacy 50/50 % tilt biphasic waveform Tuned biphasic waveform utilizing High Voltage Lead Integrity Check ( HVLIC ) impedance . Hypothesis The Tuned waveform reduce defibrillation threshold ( DFTs ) compare 50/50 % tilt waveform . Study Methods - This acute , paired-sample , randomize ( waveform test sequence ) study - Patients implant Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) approve St. Jude Medical ( SJM ) EpicTM+ DR/VR Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillator ( standard output ICD Epic+ ) defibrillation lead system . - All study test complete implant . - Patients randomized begin DFT test either 50/50 % tilt Tuned waveform . - The HVLIC feature use measure high voltage lead impedance program Tuned 50/50 % tilt waveform pulse width . - The DFT determine optimized binary search method design reduce overall number VF induction average 5.13 maintain high resolution accuracy . - Total # center - 15 center - Sample size - 60 patient
DOC.criteria: Patient candidate ICD implantation . Patient able tolerate DFT testing . Patient mechanical valve tricuspid position . Patient pregnant . Patient le 18 year old .
